title: Bubble Pop Frenzy
description: A fast-paced bubble popping game with time pressure, particle effects, and multiple difficulty levels. Pop as many bubbles as you can before time runs out!
coverStyle: background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 20%, #0c2461 0%, #1e3c72 30%, #2a5298 100%); color: white; box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
